Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards put up 37 points, 8 assists, and 7 rebounds on 48/46/75 shooting from the field against the Clippers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards showed a different side of himself to the world after the game, sharing a heartfelt moment with a young fan named Luca who was battling cancer.
Others: The Clippers are now 20-16 after losing to the Timberwolves this week.
